channel.title: Noclip help

item.title: Noclip help
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

I’ve added both noclip parts client-sided and server-sided and it still doesn’t work

Client-Sided:

if (aString887.equals("::noclip")) { for(int k1 = 0; k1 < 4; k1++) { for(int i2 = 1; i2 < 103; i2++) { for(int k2 = 1; k2 < 103; k2++) { aClass11Array1230[k1].anIntArrayArray294[i2][k2] = 0; } } } }

Server-Sided:

if(command.startsWith("noclip") && playerRights >= 2){ sM("You are now using noclip."); }

Read full topic
